name: syncScroll
short_description:
This plugin for Sublime Text 2 adds synchronized vertical scrolling on multiple files.

Installation: download and drop the syncScroll folder into your Sublime Tex 2's 'packages' folder. Note they're two files in one folder. Otherwise it won't work

Use: In the 'view' menu, toggle 'Sync Scroll'. You'll see a notice on the status bar. If Sync Scroll is toggled on on two or more files on the same windows (on different column or not), all the files will scroll together. By deactivating-activating Sync Scroll you'll be able to change their sync "anchor points". You'll find out the rest ;)

Issues: due to API limitations, it doesn't detect scrolling made via scroll bar. If you use the scroll bar, click on the file to update the scrolling.

Help: I'm a total n00b and leaned some python on the way for adding this capability to this cool editor. Please help out any way you can, if possible, code the improvements you'd like and i'll add them here.
